name: Civilization Builder
description:
In this educational game you can build ancient villages belonging to the Egyptian civilizations.

The multiplayer options will allow you to build together the civilizations teaching your students in realtime about these civilizations.

You can run the project in browser, mobile and VR:

Google Play: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.yourvrexperience.civilizationb...

Oculus Quest: https://sidequestvr.com/app/1696

The WebGL version is limited to Egyptian civilization due to memory restrictions when playing in browser. You will be able to enjoy Greek and Roman civilization in mobile, VR and desktop version.

This project is looking for funding, so if you happen to be interested in educational projects feel free to contact.
